content:
Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "elder_guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: I need to craft a crafting_table to solve this task. A crafting_table requires 4 oak_planks, which can be crafted from an oak_log. Therefore, I will first move the oak_log into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "elder_guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I can now craft the oak_planks by moving them into a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
